resources.string: Use Anki HTML/CSS rendering engine. You don\'t have to configure anything, however you won\'t be able to customize the appearance, colors, fonts and size from AnkiReview. Works for all decks.
Use AnkiReview rendering engine (doesn\'t use HTML). You can configure the appearance, color, fonts to your liking and question/answer are separately animated. Only works for simple text-based decks.
Use AnkiReview rendering engine, with selectable teacher photos. As if a teacher was asking you questions! Only works for simple text-based decks.
Couldn\'t find a style for this card. AnkiReview doesn\'t use the Anki HTML/CSS card template, you must define your style inside AnkiReview. After doing so, you will be able to review this card.
Please define a style for this card type, first by selecting question and answer fields, then by customizing the appearance of the card.
Drag from the available fields to the Question or Answer section above. You can scroll to see all available fields.
Drag fields here to show them on the Question (top part).
Drag fields here to show them on the Answer (bottom part).
Drag fields which contain an Anki sound tag, they will be played upon revealing the answer.
No Question fields defined. Drag fields to the Question section
No Answer fields defined. Drag fields to the Answer section
